alert.note: Alert for McDowell (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:46AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dickenson, western Buchanan and north and western western McDowell Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1245 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Virgie to Rock House. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clintwood, Grundy, Haysi, Breaks Interstate, John Flannagan Lake, Big Rock, Trammel, Gilbert Creek, Clinchco, Panther, Stacy, Nora, Vansant, Hurley, McClure and Roseann. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building until the storms pass. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
